name: Spicy Peach Coleslaw
author: Chef John
summary: Peaches are so sweet, juicy, and delicious, and they make a fantastic coleslaw.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Asian chile pepper sauce (such as sambal oelek)
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
½ (2 pound) cabbage - quartered and thinly sliced
1 teaspoon thinly sliced fresh chives for garnish  (Optional)
directions: Whisk mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, Asian chile sauce, lemon juice, rice vinegar, vegetable oil, and sugar in a bowl until dressing is smooth
Season with salt and cayenne pepper
Place cabbage into a large bowl; add peaches and 1 tablespoon chives
Pour dressing over coleslaw and stir until coated
Cover coleslaw with plastic wrap and chill until flavors have developed and cabbage is slightly softened, about 30 minutes
Adjust seasoning, mix again, and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon chives  before serving
